root.name: Petank Party
root.description: Join the fun in this crazy 3D sport simulation where the goal is to throw metal balls as close as possible to a little wooden ball called the Jack. Compete with up to 6 other players on a local xbox or xbox live and use magic balls to turn the game to your advantage. Customize your alien, giant cat or one of the 6 cool characters. Grab some friends and have fun with Petank Party!
